itemDescription: British actor, and producer of Doctor Who

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Bryant (27 October 1923 – 19 May 2006) was an English television producer, script editor and former actor. He acted in The Grove Family as a regular cast member and later became the producer of Doctor Who from 1967 to 1969 during Patrick Troughton's tenure as the Second Doctor. He also produced the series Paul Temple before becoming a literary agent.
